title: Sukidakara Shichauno
description:
1. Marriage na Yuuutsu (Marriage Melancholy)
2. Himitsu no Yoru (A Secret Night)
3. Himitsu no Futari (A Secret Couple)
4. Boku to Pen to Kami-sama (The Pen, the Goddess and I)
5. Shitagi Ouji (Shorts Prince)
6. Cosplay (Cosplaying!)

8. Purify!
9. Primula
10. Madder
